column4: So why... WHY is it that I'm told I hvae 3.0.14 installed, but firefox about still says 3.0.4, and why did the devs go with 3.0.4 for release to begin with? It crashes all the friggin time
ok, and I got did sudo apt-get remove firefox and I STILL have firefox
there is a serious bug in FF 3.04.14, you have to constantly kill npviewer.bin, that's what makes FF crash, it's fixed in jaunty though
